tetris.domain

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • tetris.domain.Block

  • public class Block
extends Object
    Blocks are building blocks for pieces.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Block(int x, int y, Color color)
      Constructs a block with color and coordinates of given x,y and color values.
